Articles.Content: In the wreckage of the astronaut complex, I found a toilet on the end of a long pipe. This was rather unusual and I am wondering if it is an easter egg.
Yep, It's an egg. A rather forgotten one it seems.

It is, and it's been recorded in the Easter Egg hunt 0.25.

Still, good spot, I wasn't able to see it for a while.
Ok, thanks. I was slightly confused because I hadn't seen it before.
The toilet is the only thing that survive? I wonder what kind of things that kerbal eat that require such a sturdy toilet.

The toilet is the only thing that survive? I wonder what kind of things that kerbal eat that require such a sturdy toilet.

Slurm would be my best guess
Yup, got that already on the radar
That must have been one vicious fart. Was Jeb eating bean burritos again?
It's probably made out of recycled structural pylons.
Commander Jeb Kerman - Master Pilot, Master Ship builder and Technician, ... Master Plumber!

It's probably made out of recycled structural pylons.

Yeah, probably.

This is a relatively well-known Easter Egg...

I started an extremely unsuccessful campaign to name this the Immortal Space Toilet!

Click the link at the bottom of my signature if you dare. The reference comes at about 2:00

Iv'e watched most of your vids, but when it came to "IMMORTAL SPACE TOILET!", it kind of made me cringe. Now I guess I'm gonna have to watch it. Just kidding, love your stuff. You should be KSP's main P.R. man. You have the ability to create positive riots!
Heh, T believe I may have been the first person to actually report this. Shortly after 0.25 was released, I discovered it as well as something else and made a thread bout it.
The toilet is much bigger than a Kerbal. It makes me wonder if there are other creatures living with the Kerbals.
